mapper.select: select wp.id as pId, wp.personId as pPersonId, wp.sortId as pSortId, ws.name as pTwoLevelSortName, wp.lookNum as pLookNum, wp.problemTitle as pProblemTitle, wp.problemContent as pProblemContent, wp.`delete` as pDelete, wp.createTime as pCreateTime, wp.updateTime as pUpdateTime, us.id AS uId, us.name AS uName, us.username AS uUserName, us.userAvatar AS uUuserAvatar from web_problem wp left join sys_user us on wp.personId = us.id left join web_sort ws on wp.sortId = ws.id where wp.id = #{problemId}
mapper.insert: insert into web_problem( personId, sortId, lookNum, problemTitle, problemContent, `delete`, createTime, updateTime )values( #{personId}, #{sortId}, #{lookNum}, #{problemTitle}, #{problemContent}, #{delete}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
